text: Žiar nad Hronom (; ) is a city in the Banská Bystrica Region in Slovakia. In year live people live there. It was known as Svätý Kríž until 1920 and as Svätý Kríž nad Hronom until 1955. == Population == == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Cities in Slovakia Category:Banská Bystrica Region
title: Žiar nad Hronom
